all_projects.project_desc: An app designed to incentivize users to work towards a goal every day for 60 days, with the help of a digital pet! Earn points by `doing the thing` every day, and use them to buy accessories to dress up your pets.
Oh no! Your bug friend got captured by a crow and is taken into the underground! Traverse through the pits and save them! (Created by Andrew Sanchez and Maritza Padilla)

A place where working people can quickly and easily access inexpensive recipes that align with their needs, and plan out meals using a random recipe generator specific to their inputted criteria. (Created by Andrew Lee, Maritza Padilla, and Ann Wang)
A website to host information about GraceHack's upcoming events, specifically the first and only hackathon dedicated to gender-diverse students getting a footing in STEM.
